featured.text: Besides, soybeans can be fed to a variety of other animals ranging from livestock to silk worms.
Bam once blossomed as a trading post on the Silk Road.

definition.zh_def: 一種由蠶織造的細長纖維，通常用於製作衣物和其他紡織品。
definition.en_def: A fine, soft fiber produced by silkworms, often used to make clothing and other textiles.
definition.example: She wore a beautiful silk dress to the party.
